all: LEFT JOIN `kenmerken_taal` kt_land ON ev.`land`=kt_land.`code` AND kt_land.`tabel`='land'
LEFT JOIN `kenmerken_taal` kt_provincie ON ev.`provincie`=kt_provincie.`code` AND kt_provincie.`tabel`='provincie'
LEFT JOIN `kenmerken_taal` kt_moeder ON ev.`scode`=kt_moeder.`code` AND kt_moeder.`tabel`='moeder'
LEFT JOIN `kenmerken_taal` kt_scode ON ev.`scode`=kt_scode.`code` AND kt_scode.`tabel`='scode'
LEFT JOIN `kenmerken_taal` kt_bcode ON ev.`bcode`=kt_bcode.`code` AND kt_bcode.`tabel`='bcode'
LEFT JOIN `kenmerken_taal` kt_type ON kt_type.`tabel`='type' AND FIND_IN_SET(LEFT(kt_type.`code`,6),ev.`type`)

_version_._comment: If you remove this field, you must _also_ disable the update log in solrconfig.xml or Solr won't start. _version_ and update log are required for SolrCloud

_root_._comment: Points to the root document of a block of nested documents. Required for nested document support, may be removed otherwise

id._comment: Only remove the 'id' field if you have a very good reason to. While not strictly required, it is highly recommended. A <uniqueKey> is present in almost all Solr installations. See the <uniqueKey> declaration below where <uniqueKey> is set to 'id'.

latitude.dataSourceStatement: (CASE WHEN ev.`b_accuracy` >= 7 AND ev.`b_latitude` > 0 THEN ev.`b_latitude` ELSE NULL END)

longitude.dataSourceStatement: (CASE WHEN ev.`b_accuracy` >= 7 AND ev.`b_latitude` > 0 THEN ev.`b_longitude` ELSE NULL END)

latitude_longitude.dataSourceStatement: (CASE WHEN ev.`b_accuracy` >= 7 AND ev.`b_latitude` > 0 THEN COALESCE(CONCAT_WS(',',ev.`b_latitude`,ev.`b_longitude`), NULL) ELSE NULL END)

location_tags_[lang].dataSourceStatement: CONCAT_WS('⁞', kt01.waarde_[lang_map], kt03.waarde_[lang_map], kt04.waarde_[lang_map], kt05.waarde_[lang_map], kt06.waarde_[lang_map], kt07.waarde_[lang_map], kt41.waarde_[lang_map], kt43.waarde_[lang_map], kt95.waarde_[lang_map], GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT kt11.waarde_[lang_map] SEPARATOR '⁞'))

location_sub_tags_[lang].dataSourceStatement: CONCAT_WS('⁞', kt09.waarde_[lang_map], kt71.waarde_[lang_map], kt92.waarde_[lang_map], GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT kt96.waarde_[lang_map] SEPARATOR '⁞'),  GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT kt97.waarde_[lang_map] SEPARATOR '⁞'))
